channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon shares pop on earnings beat, cloud growth
item.description: The company's cloud and advertising units showed strong growth.

item.title: Chevron beats earnings expectations, returns more than $7 billion to shareholders
item.description: Chevron's stock is largely flat for the year, underperforming the S&P 500 energy sector which has gained more than 6%.

item.title: Financial Guru, TV Star, Bestselling Author? Not So Fast
item.description: The marketing that some financial advisers use to attract clients can be misleading. Make sure you don’t fall for their ‘trustwashing.’

item.title: Peloton raises its full-year profit guidance, but expects the holiday quarter to be softer than expected
item.description: Peloton's cash flows are improving, but it's expecting to sell fewer bikes and treadmills during its holiday quarter than Wall Street expected.

item.title: Samsung Electronics' chip profit shrinks 40% from the previous quarter
item.description: The semiconductor unit reported third-quarter operating profit of 3.86 trillion won (about $2.8 billion), down 40% from the previous quarter.

item.title: Stocks Rise After U.S. Added Just 12,000 Jobs in October
item.description: Stocks edged higher after the jobs report showed the economy added just 12,000 jobs last month.

item.title: Gold Rises as U.S. Job Growth Slows
item.description: A slowdown in jobs growth in the past month has given gold futures a small boost.

item.title: U.S. Treasury Yields Fall After Jobs Data
item.description: U.S. Treasury yields dropped after data showed job creation stalled last month amid the effects of a big strike at Boeing and two recent hurricanes,.

item.title: Exxon earnings beat, increases fourth-quarter dividend
item.description: Exxon's stock rose in early trading after beating earnings expectations.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Edge Higher
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were higher but struggling to make headway while seasonal weather-driven demand remained elusive.
